verses.verse: Likewise, <S%G3668><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Wives, <S%G1135><s%> Being Subject <S%G5293><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Your Own <S%G2398><s%> Husbands, <S%G435><s%> That, <S%G2443><s%> Even <S%G2532><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> Any <S%G5100><s%> Are Disobedient <S%G544><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Word, <S%G3056><s%> By <S%G1223><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Wives <S%G1135><s%> Conduct <S%G391><s%> Without The <S%G427><s%> Word <S%G3056><s%> They May Be Gained, <S%G2770><s%>
Having Witnessed Carried Out <S%G2029><s%> <S%G3588><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Fear <S%G5401><s%> Chaste <S%G53><s%> Conduct <S%G391><s%> Your; <S%G5216><s%>

Whose <S%G3739><s%> Let It Not Be <S%G2077><s%> <S%G3756><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Outward One <S%G1855><s%> Of Braiding <S%G1708><s%> Of Hair, <S%G2359><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Putting Around <S%G4025><s%> Of Gold, <S%G5553><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> Putting On <S%G1745><s%> Of Garments <S%G2440><s%> Adoring; <S%G2889><s%>

' But <S%G235><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Hidden <S%G2927><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Heart <S%G2588><s%> Man, <S%G444><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Incorruptible Ornament <S%G862><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Meek <S%G4239><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Quiet <S%G2272><s%> Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> Before <S%G1799><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Of Great Price. <S%G4185><s%>

<S%G3779><s%> For Thus <S%G1063><s%> Formerly <S%G4218><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Holy <S%G40><s%> Women <S%G1135><s%> Those <S%G3588><s%> Hoping <S%G1679><s%> In <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Adorned <S%G2885><s%> Themselves, <S%G1438><s%> Being Subject <S%G5293><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Their Own <S%G2398><s%> Husbands; <S%G435><s%>

As <S%G5613><s%> Sarah <S%G4564><s%> Obeyed <S%G5219><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Abraham, <S%G11><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Calling; <S%G2564><s%> Of Whom <S%G3739><s%> Ye Became <S%G1096><s%> Children, <S%G5043><s%> Doing Good <S%G15><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3361><s%> Not Fearing With <S%G5399><s%> Any <S%G3367><s%> Consternation. <S%G4423><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> Husbands <S%G435><s%> Likewise, <S%G3668><s%> Dwelling With Them <S%G4924><s%> According <S%G2596><s%> To Knowledge, <S%G1108><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> With A Weaker Even <S%G772><s%> Vessel <S%G4632><s%> With The <S%G3588><s%> Female, <S%G1134><s%> Rendering <S%G632><s%> Them Honour, <S%G5092><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Also Being <S%G2532><s%> Joint Heirs <S%G4789><s%> Of The Grace <S%G5485><s%> Of Life, <S%G2222><s%> So As <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> To Be Cut Off <S%G1581><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4335><s%> Your Prayers. <S%G5216><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> <S%G1161><s%> Finally, <S%G5056><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Being Of One Mind, <S%G3675><s%> Sympathizing, <S%G4835><s%> Loving The Brethren, <S%G5361><s%> Tender Hearted, <S%G2155><s%> Friendly, <S%G5391><s%>

Not <S%G3361><s%> Rendering <S%G591><s%> Evil <S%G2556><s%> For <S%G473><s%> Evil, <S%G2556><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> Railing <S%G3059><s%> For <S%G473><s%> Railing; <S%G3059><s%> <S%G5121><s%> But On The Contrary, <S%G1161><s%> Blessing, <S%G2127><s%> Knowing <S%G1492><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> Ye Were Called, <S%G2564><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Blessing <S%G2129><s%> Ye Should Inherit. <S%G2816><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> For He That <S%G1063><s%> Wills <S%G2309><s%> Life <S%G2222><s%> To Love, <S%G25><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To See <S%G1492><s%> Days <S%G2250><s%> Good, <S%G18><s%> Let Him Cause To Cease <S%G3973><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1100><s%> His Tongue <S%G846><s%> From <S%G575><s%> Evil, <S%G2556><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Lips <S%G5491><s%> His <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> To Speak <S%G2980><s%> Guile. <S%G1388><s%>

Let Him Turn Aside <S%G1578><s%> From <S%G575><s%> Evil, <S%G2556><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Let Him Do <S%G4160><s%> Good. <S%G18><s%> Let Him Seek <S%G2212><s%> Peace <S%G1515><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Let Him Pursue <S%G1377><s%> It : <S%G846><s%>

Because <S%G3754><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Eyes <S%G3788><s%> Of The Lord Are <S%G2962><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> The Righteous, <S%G1342><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3775><s%> His Ears <S%G846><s%> Towards <S%G1519><s%> <S%G1162><s%> Their Supplication. <S%G846><s%> <S%G4383><s%> But The Face <S%G1161><s%> Of The Lord Is <S%G2962><s%> Against <S%G1909><s%> Those Doing <S%G4160><s%> Evil. <S%G2556><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Who Is <S%G5101><s%> He That <S%G3588><s%> Shall Injure <S%G2559><s%> You, <S%G5209><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> Of That Which Is <S%G3588><s%> Good <S%G18><s%> Imitators <S%G3402><s%> Ye Should Be? <S%G1096><s%>

' But <S%G235><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Ye Should Suffer <S%G3958><s%> On Account Of <S%G1223><s%> Righteousness, <S%G1343><s%> Blessed Are Ye ; <S%G3107><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1161><s%> <S%G5401><s%> But Their Fear <S%G846><s%> <S%G3361><s%> Ye Should Not Be Afraid Of, <S%G5399><s%> Neither <S%G3366><s%> Should Ye Be Troubled; <S%G5015><s%>

<S%G2962><s%> But Lord <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Sanctify <S%G37><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2588><s%> Your Hearts, <S%G5216><s%> <S%G2092><s%> And Ready <S%G1161><s%> Be Always <S%G104><s%> For <S%G4314><s%> A Defence <S%G627><s%> To Everyone <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3588><s%> That Asks <S%G154><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> An Account <S%G3056><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> You <S%G5213><s%> Hope, <S%G1680><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> Meekness <S%G4240><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Fear; <S%G5401><s%>

A Conscience <S%G4893><s%> Having <S%G2192><s%> Good, <S%G18><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> <S%G1722><s%> Whereas <S%G3739><s%> They May Speak Against <S%G2635><s%> You <S%G5216><s%> As <S%G5613><s%>, Evil Doers, <S%G2555><s%> They Mat Be Ashamed <S%G2617><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Calumniate <S%G1908><s%> Your <S%G5216><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Good <S%G18><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Manner Of Life. <S%G391><s%>

<S%G2909><s%> For It Is Better, <S%G1063><s%> For You Doing Good, <S%G15><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> Wills It <S%G2309><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Will <S%G2307><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God, <S%G2316><s%> To Suffer, <S%G3958><s%> Than <S%G2228><s%> Doing Evil; <S%G2554><s%>

Because <S%G3754><s%> Indeed <S%G2532><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Once <S%G530><s%> For <S%G4012><s%> Sins <S%G266><s%> Suffered, The <S%G3958><s%> Just <S%G1342><s%> For The <S%G5228><s%> Unjust, <S%G94><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Us <S%G2248><s%> He Might Bring <S%G4317><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To God; <S%G2316><s%> <S%G2289><s%> Having Been Put To Death <S%G3303><s%> In Flesh, <S%G4561><s%> <S%G2227><s%> But Made Alive <S%G1161><s%> By The <S%G3588><s%> Spirit, <S%G4151><s%>
In <S%G1722><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Prison <S%G5438><s%> Spirits <S%G4151><s%> Having Gone <S%G4198><s%> He Preached, Who <S%G2784><s%>

Disobeyed <S%G544><s%> Sometime, <S%G4218><s%> When <S%G3753><s%> Once <S%G530><s%> Was Waiting <S%G1551><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> Longsuffering <S%G3115><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Days <S%G2250><s%> Of Noah, While Was <S%G3575><s%> Being Prepared The <S%G2680><s%> Ark, <S%G2787><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%>, Few, <S%G3641><s%> ' <S%G5124><s%> <S%G2076><s%> Eight <S%G3638><s%> Souls, <S%G5590><s%> Were Saved <S%G1295><s%> ' Through <S%G1223><s%> Water, <S%G5204><s%>

Which <S%G3739><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Us <S%G2248><s%> Figure <S%G499><s%> Now <S%G3568><s%> Saves Even <S%G4982><s%> Baptism, <S%G908><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Of Flesh <S%G4561><s%> A Putting Away <S%G595><s%> Of The Filth, <S%G4509><s%> But <S%G235><s%> Of A Conscience <S%G4893><s%> Good The <S%G18><s%> Demand <S%G1906><s%> Towards <S%G1519><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> ' By The <S%G1223><s%> Resurrection <S%G386><s%> Of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%>

Who <S%G3739><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> At The <S%G1722><s%> Right Hand <S%G1188><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God, <S%G2316><s%> Gone <S%G4198><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> Heaven, <S%G3772><s%> Having Been Subjected <S%G5293><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> Angels <S%G32><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Authorities <S%G1849><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Powers. <S%G1411><s%>
